titleStmt.title: SII 12.148: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 148. (A.R. No. 530 of 1922). TIRUKKAṆṆAPURAM, NANNILAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SECOND PRĀKĀRA IN THE ŚAURIRĀJA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is an incomplete record of Peruñjiṅgadēva dated in the 5th year and is called a mūlasādhanam Compare such terms as sādhanam, ōlai, tirumandira-ōlai, niyōgam, tirumugam or śrīmukha tīṭṭu and śattimugam used in inscriptions.of the chief. It records a sale of land in Śembiyaṉ Kurudaiyāḍi, situated in Paṉaiyūr-nāḍu, a subdivision of Kulōttuṅgaśōḻa-vaḷanāḍu to Udaiyaṉ Tiruñānasambandaṉ Aḻagiyāṉ Rājadivākara-Mūvēndiravēḷāṉ of Viḻiyūr in Āvūr-kūṟṟam, a subdivision of Nittavinōda-vaḷanāḍu by Araiyaṉ Puṟṟiḍaṅkoṇḍāṉ Dēvapperumāḷ, the headman of Kurudaiyāḍi in Tañjāvūr-kūṟṟam, a subdivision of Pāṇḍikulāśaṉi-vaḷanāḍu. As the record is incomplete further details as to the purpose of the transaction are not clear.
The details of date given in the inscription are not regular.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
mulacātaṉam . śrīmat peruñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu [5- vatu] makaranāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣa ttu daśami yum tiṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aṉiḻattunāḷ nittavinotavaḷanāṭṭu Āvūrkkūṟṟattu viḻiyūruṭaiyāṉ vutaiyaṉ tiruñānacampantaṉ Aḻakiyā ṉirācativākara muventiraveḷāṉukku pāṇṭikulācaṉivaḷanāṭṭu tañcāvūṟkūṟṟattu kurutaiyāṭikiḻāṉ Araiyaṉ puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭāṉ
tevapperumāḷe ṟṟa nilamāvatu . kulottuṅkacoḻavaḷa nāṭṭu paṇaiyūrnāṭṭu cempiyaṉkurutaiyāṭiyil nattamum viḷainilamumāvatu . kiḻaikkuru taiyāṭiyil teṟkil māḷikai nattattil maṉaikku Ellaiyāvatu kiḻpāṟkellai paṭṭappāḻukku meṟkum teṉpāṟkkellai nattam kuḻi 100 8 10 Ituvum maṉṟukku vaṭakkil kiḻtiṭal nattam kuḻi 2 10 5 Ikkuḻi Irupattañcum Āka na
ttam kuḻi 2 100 5 Ikkuḻi 3 1000 100 2 10 5- kku kuḻi Irunūṟṟirupattañcum Ivaṟkku viṟṟa viḷainilamāvatu melainattattukkut teṟkku paṭṭappāḻ nattattukkuk kiḻakkuvāyttu percollappaṭṭa nilam vapa-innilam Āṟumāvum Itaṉ meṟku vāykkālukku meṟku tukkaiv(ā)yakkal Eṉṟu percollappaṭṭa nilamkhatma Innilam kāle mukkāṇi yum paṭṭappāḻukkut teṟku vāṉavaṉ vāykkāl nilam
4 tma Iṉṉilam na vaṉ koyi(l)lukkut teṟkku Ayyaṉ tiruvip puttaṭi nilam 4 cuṟā-l nālumāvaraiyum Itaṉ kiḻakkuttaṭik viḷākam nilam � Iṉṉi laṅ kālekāṇiyum Itaṉ kiḻakku Araiyaṉkāl nilam kha- kku Innilam kālle mukkāṇiyum I(ṉa)taṉ teṟku nilam 4 pa� Innilam nālumākkāṇi Iṅku viṭṭu meṟkku vaṭakkaṭaiya pūppaṟi yal vāykkā(l)lukkut teṟku
pūppaṟiyalkkuṭṭa ṅku viṭṭuk kiḻakku kiḻainattattukku teṟku ci peṟāṟu kuṭikkuṭi Ellaikku vaṭakku mevumāka tāṉ kaṭṭaḷai nilam nta � Iṉṉilam muk kāle Iraṇṭu māmukkaṇiyum Uṭaiyār puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭanāyiṉār tiruiruppukku vaṭakku nilam� tma Innilam mukkālemukkāṇiyum Itaṉ kiḻakku Arunta The inscription stops here.
